MemoryInfobox.description: 'Claiming to have the sheer power of a titan, Gaia the Fist|Gaia had chosen a blood-spattered road to fame. It was up to Kassandra to end that destruction.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'
MemoryInfobox.previous: Agis of the North (memory)|Agis of the North

General_Description: '''Gaia the Fist''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: At the request of the old [[Ide|lady]], Kassandra hunted down a [[mercenary]] known as [[Gaia the Fist]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''
